solution_line_template: {boys_on_trip} boys + {girls_on_trip} girls = <<{boys_on_trip}+{girls_on_trip}={students_joined_trip}>>{students_joined_trip} students joined the field trip.

Thus, {total_students_assigned} - {students_joined_trip} = <<{total_students_assigned}-{students_joined_trip}={girls_not_able_to_join}>>{girls_not_able_to_join} girls were not able to join the field trip.
